titleStmt.title: The rules and orders of the Court of Common-Pleas made since his Majestie's restauration: taken from the originals of the said court, with the allowance and approbation of the Right Honourable the Lord Chief Justice North, and the judges of that court.
Rules, etc.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Court of Common Pleas.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the assigns of Richard and Edward Atkyns, esquires, for Robert Pawlet, at the Bible in Chancery-Lane near Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: With an order to print preceeding title page.
With an initial table of contents and a final advertisment page.
Running title reads: Rules and orders of the Court of Common-Pleas.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.

place.placeName: the Bible in Chancery-Lane near Fleet-street
